bill.title: An Act Regarding Offenses against an Unborn Child
bill.description: An Act Regarding Offenses against an Unborn Child

history.action: (S) Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY
(S) suggested and ordered printed
(S) Senator MASON of Androscoggin moved to REFER to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY

(S) On motion by Senator COURTNEY of York Tabled Later Today Assigned pending Motion by Senator MASON of Androscoggin to REFER to the Committee on Criminal Justice and Public Safety Unfinished Business
(S) Taken from the table by the President On motion by Senator Mason of Androscoggin REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
(H) Bill REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY.
(H) In concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.

(S) Reports READ Senator MASON of Androscoggin moved to Accept the Majority Ought to Pass As Amended Report On motion by Same Senator Tabled Later Today Assigned pending ACCEPTANCE of Majority Ought to Pass As Amended Report Unfinished Business

(S) Taken from the table by the President Senator Mason of Androscoggin moved to accept the majority ought to pass as amended by committee amendment "a" (s-207) report FAILED (Remarks Made) On motion by Senator ALFOND of Cumberland Roll Call Ordered Roll Call # 173
(S) 15 Yeas - 18 Nays- 2 Excused - 0 Absent minority ought not to pass report accepted Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
(H) Reports READ.
(H) Representative CURTIS of Madison moved to ACCEPT the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report.
(H) On further motion of the same Representative TABLED pending his motion to ACCEPT the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report.
(H) Later today assigned.
(H) Speaker laid before the House
(H) Subsequently, the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report FAILED.
(H) ROLL CALL NO. 136 (Yeas 66 - Nays 81 - Absent 3 - Excused 0) (Vacancy 1)
(H) Subsequently, the Minority Ought Not to Pass Report was ACCEPTED.
(H) In concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(H) Placed in the Legislative Files. (DEAD)
